name: Stars of a Happy Family Festival Vol. 4

image.alt: Stars of a Happy Family Festival Vol. 4 flyer, featuring Come with Reverse and Mitič Threesome on July 15, 2014, in Thessaloniki.

body:
Come with Reverse, one more live in their city on 15-7-2014 participating in a Festival organised by Silver Dollar.

Star’s Of A Happy Family #4.

Come with Reverse will be Playing together with Mitič Threesome.
